greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = floor[((e-1)+sigma(p^e)) / e].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) A326043(n) = if(1==n,n, my(f = factor(n)); prod(i=1, #f~, floor( ((f[i,2]-1)+sigma(f[i,1]^f[i,2])) / f[i,2])));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 04 2019
